title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

jump_scares.spoiler: The presumed dead man suddenly grabs Helen
The drowning man suddenly opens his eyes, startling Barry
Missy appears behind Julie and Helen
Helen turns around and is startled by a hanging coat
Missy bangs on the car window
Elsa puts her hand on Helen’s shoulder
Julie opens the car boot and sees Max’s corpse covered in crabs
Missy approaches Julie with a knife
The killer jumps out from underneath a plastic sheet and attacks Helen. [Video]
The killer suddenly appears behind Helen
A corpse slides down in front of Julie
Julie puts her hand on the face of another corpse
A dark figure crashes through the door. [Video]
